item.title: 流媒体在12月占据美国近半数电视收视份额，《怪奇物语》助推增长
item.description: 尼尔森公司周二发布的数据显示，流媒体服务在去年12月占据了美国近半数电视收视份额，这主要得益于Netflix在圣诞节当天播出的NFL赛事以及万众期待的《怪奇物语》最终季。【原文：Streaming services captured nearly half of all television viewership in the U.S. in December, powered by Netflix's Christmas Day NFL games and the highly anticipated final season of "Stranger Things," audience measurement firm Nielsen reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家：德国TKMS公司寻求投资方案，力争赢得加拿大120亿美元潜艇招标项目
item.description: 德国战舰制造商TKMS公司首席执行官表示，该公司正与挪威和德国企业洽谈，计划在竞争激烈的加拿大潜艇招标中提交价值数十亿美元的投资方案，以期击败韩国竞争对手的投标。【原文：Warship builder TKMS is in talks with Norwegian and German companies to offer a multi-billion dollar investment package to Canada in a fiercely competitive submarine tender, its CEO said, hoping to beat a rival South Korean bid.】

item.title: 爱丁堡环球股东否决萨巴资本提出的董事会重组方案
item.description: 爱丁堡环球投资信托公司周二表示，其股东已否决了最大股东萨巴资本提出的全部决议，这些决议旨在更换公司整个董事会。【原文：Edinburgh Worldwide Investment Trust said on Tuesday its shareholders have rejected all resolutions proposed by top shareholder Saba Capital to replace its entire board.】

item.title: 丹麦养老基金将撤资其持有的美国国债
item.description: 丹麦养老基金AkademikerPension周二表示，将在本月底前抛售其持有的美国国债，价值约1亿美元，并指责美国政府财政状况疲软。【原文：Danish pension fund AkademikerPension said ‌on Tuesday it would sell off its holding of U.S. Treasuries, worth some $100 million, by the end of this month, blaming ‌weak U.S. government finances.】

item.title: 美国银行股下跌，投资者权衡信用卡利率上限截止期限
item.description: 周二早盘交易中，美国银行股随大盘下跌，投资者正等待特朗普政府是否会执行1月20日实施的信用卡利率10%上限政策。【原文：U.S. bank stocks fell in morning trading on Tuesday in a broader market decline, as investors awaited clarity on whether the Trump administration's January 20 deadline to implement a 10% cap on credit ​card interest rates will take effect.】

item.title: 世界银行称新兴市场未能充分发挥经济潜力
item.description: 世界银行周二表示，过去几十年间，前沿市场经济未能充分发挥其潜力，投资增长急剧放缓，而国内资本市场仍处于欠发达状态。【原文：Frontier market economies have failed to ​live up to their potential in recent decades, suffering from a sharp slowdown in investment ‌growth while domestic capital markets remained underdeveloped, the World Bank said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 诺和诺德扩大与Aspect Biosystems的糖尿病细胞疗法合作
item.description: 丹麦制药商诺和诺德与加拿大私营企业Aspect Biosystems周二宣布，双方已达成合作协议，共同开发基于细胞的糖尿病治疗方案。【原文：Danish drugmaker Novo Nordisk and Canada-based privately held Aspect Biosystems said on Tuesday they have struck a partnership to develop cell-based treatments for diabetes.】

item.title: 最高法院正通过社交媒体审议特朗普解雇美联储委员丽莎·库克一事
item.description: 在围绕特朗普总统解雇美联储理事丽莎·库克的争议中，该案将于周三提交美国最高法院审理。大法官们可能重点关注总统利用社交媒体实施这一前所未有行动的行为。【原文：In the battle over President Donald Trump's effort to fire Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook that is set to go before the U.S. Supreme Court on Wednesday, the justices may focus on the president's use of social media to carry out this unprecedented action.】

item.title: 独家：Palantir与现代汽车达成价值数亿美元的高清合作，CEO看好韩国市场
item.description: 帕兰蒂尔公司高管表示，这家美国科技企业已与现代重工达成重大协议，将向其出售更多软件，从而扩大其在韩国重工业领域的业务。【原文：Palantir leaders said the U.S. technology company has clinched a large deal to sell more software to HD Hyundai , ramping up its heavy-industry work in South Korea.】

item.title: 美国专利局驳回第三方对第一太阳能专利的异议
item.description: 第一太阳能公司周二表示，美国专利商标局局长驳回了三项由第三方提出的、质疑其太阳能电池技术专利有效性的申请。【原文：First Solar said on Tuesday the United States Patent and Trademark Office director denied three separate third-party applications challenging the validity of its solar cell technology patents.】

item.title: 米兰博科尼大学与理工大学将创业中心并入ION支持的基金会
item.description: 米兰博科尼大学和米兰理工大学正将其支持初创企业的业务整合至欧洲科技基金会（TEF）。该基金会由全球金融科技与数据集团ION提供支持。【原文：Milan's Bocconi and Politecnico universities are placing their operations that promote startup ventures into Tech Europe Foundation (TEF), a foundation backed by global fintech and data group ION, TEF said.】

item.title: 欧盟逐步淘汰高风险技术，目标直指华为等中国企业
item.description: The European Union plans to phase out components and equipment from high-risk suppliers in critical sectors, according to a draft proposal released by the European Commission on Tuesday, a move expected to affect Huawei and other Chinese tech companies.

item.title: Fastenal misses quarterly revenue estimates as higher tariffs impact demand
item.description: 工业用品分销商富斯泰纳周二公布的第四季度营收低于华尔街预期，因关税上调推高了产品价格并导致需求下降。【原文：Industrial supplies distributor Fastenal on Tuesday reported fourth-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates as higher ​tariffs inflated prices and lowered demand for ‌its products.】

item.title: 巴西数字银行PicPay计划在美国IPO中实现25亿美元估值
item.description: PicPay周二表示，其在美国首次公开募股（IPO）的估值目标高达24.6亿美元。在历经多年停滞后，巴西发行商正重返纽约市场。【原文：PicPay said on Tuesday it was targeting ​a valuation of up to $2.46 billion in its long-sought U.S. ‌initial public offering, as Brazilian issuers return to New York after years-long drought.】

item.title: 独家：刚果在矿产协议下向美国投资者提供锰、铜钴及锂矿资产
item.description: 刚果民主共和国已向华盛顿提交一份国有资产候选名单——包括锰矿、铜钴矿、金矿及锂矿项目——供美国投资者作为矿产合作项目进行考量，两名刚果高级官员如是表示。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo has sent Washington a shortlist of state-owned assets - including manganese, copper-cobalt, gold and lithium projects - for U.S. investors to consider as part of a minerals partnership, two senior Congolese officials said.】

item.title: 百时美施贵宝携手微软推进人工智能驱动的肺癌检测
item.description: 百时美施贵宝周二宣布，已与微软签署协议，将采用这家科技公司的AI辅助放射学平台，以加速肺癌的早期检测。【原文：Bristol Myers Squibb said on Tuesday it had signed an agreement with Microsoft to use the tech company's AI-enabled radiology platform to help speed up early detection of lung cancer.】

item.title: D.R. Horton季度业绩超预期，激励措施推动房屋销售增长
item.description: 美国住宅建筑商D.R. Horton周二公布的季度利润和营收均超出华尔街预期，其推出的购房激励措施以及美联储降息举措共同推动了房屋销售增长。【原文：U.S. homebuilder D.R. Horton posted first-quarter profit and revenue above Wall Street's estimates on Tuesday, as its incentive offers for buyers ​and the Federal Reserve's interest-rate cuts boosted home sales.】

item.title: 贝森特：就信用卡公司的做法展开讨论并非不合理
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特·贝森特周二表示，就信用卡公司的做法展开讨论是合理的，可以考虑多方面因素。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday it was not unreasonable to have a discussion on the practices of credit card companies and a number of things can be considered.】

item.title: 美国银行集团利润激增，得益于利息收入与手续费收入的双重提振
item.description: 美国银行集团周二公布的数据显示，其第四季度利润跃升近23%，这家全美第五大贷款机构从利息支付中获得更多收益，同时手续费收入也实现增长。【原文：U.S. Bancorp reported a nearly 23% jump in fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday as the country's fifth-largest lender earned more from interest payments and saw growth in fee revenue.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称环球音乐收购Downtown唱片案即将获欧盟批准
item.description: 知情人士透露，环球音乐集团以7.75亿美元收购Downtown Music的交易即将获得欧盟反垄断批准，此前监管机构已表示接受其出售后者版税服务平台的提议。【原文：Universal Music Group is set to secure EU antitrust approval for its $775 million bid for Downtown Music after regulators signalled acceptance of its offer to sell the latter's royalty services platform, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 法律人工智能初创企业Ivo在最新融资轮中筹集5500万美元
item.description: 人工智能初创企业Ivo在最新融资轮中筹集了5500万美元，此轮融资由现有投资者Blackbird领投，旨在加速其法律服务平台的开发进程，并增聘销售人员以满足日益增长的市场需求。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Ivo raised $55 million in a funding round, led by existing investor Blackbird, to speed up development of its legal services platform and hire more salespeople to tap growing demand.】

item.title: 独家：知情人士称和记黄埔考虑将全球电信资产在伦敦和香港上市
item.description: 知情人士透露，香港跨国企业长江和记实业正考虑将其全球电信业务从集团剥离后，最早于第三季度在伦敦和香港两地上市。【原文：Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison Holdings is weighing listing its global telecommunications business in London and Hong Kong as early as the third quarter after spinning it off from the group, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 印度人工智能初创公司Emergent在软银集团和Khosla Ventures领投的融资轮中筹集7000万美元。
item.description: 印度软件应用开发初创公司Emergent周二宣布，已完成7000万美元融资，本轮融资由软银愿景基金和Khosla Ventures领投。【原文：Indian software application creator startup Emergent has raised $70 million in funding as part of a round led by ​SoftBank Vision Fund and Khosla Ventures, the company said on ‌Tuesday.】

item.title: 第五第三银行报告称，受利息收入增长推动，第四季度利润实现上升。
item.description: 美国地区性银行第五第三银行集团周二公布，受贷款需求回升带动利息收入增长推动，其第四季度利润实现增长。【原文：U.S. regional bank Fifth Third Bancorp on Tuesday reported a rise in fourth-quarter profit, helped by higher interest income ​as loan demand picked up.】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚航空公司订购九架波音787梦想客机，推进远程航线布局
item.description: 非洲最大航空公司埃塞俄比亚航空公司周二宣布，在远程旅行需求不断增长的背景下，已向波音公司订购九架787梦想客机。【原文：Africa's largest carrier Ethiopian Airlines placed an order for nine Boeing 787 Dreamliner jets amid growing demand for long-haul travel, the two companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 红杉资本、Accel资本支持的Ethos Technologies公司计划在美国IPO中实现13亿美元估值
item.description: 由风险投资公司Accel和红杉资本支持的Ethos Technologies周二表示，其在美国首次公开募股（IPO）的目标估值高达12.6亿美元，随着保险行业IPO热潮延续至2026年。【原文：Ethos ​Technologies, backed by venture ‌capital firms Accel and Sequoia, said on Tuesday it was targeting a valuation of up ‌to $1.26 billion in its U.S. ​initial public offering, as the insurance IPO momentum extends into 2026.】

item.title: 诺瓦瓦克斯与辉瑞达成疫苗开发许可协议
item.description: 诺瓦瓦克斯公司周二宣布，已与辉瑞公司达成许可协议，共同开发传染病疫苗产品。【原文：Novavax said on Tuesday it was entering into a licensing agreement with Pfizer to develop vaccine products for infectious diseases.】

item.title: 美国贷款机构KeyCorp因利息收入增加而超出第四季度盈利预期
item.description: KeyCorp周二公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，这家美国贷款机构的利息收入和投资银行手续费均有所增长。【原文：KeyCorp beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday, as the U.S. lender earned higher interest and investment banking fees.】

item.title: 美国银行将向非管理层员工授予价值10亿美元的股票
item.description: 美国银行周二宣布，将在利润激增的强劲财年收官之际，向除高级管理层外的全体员工发放约10亿美元股权奖励。【原文：Bank of America said on Tuesday it will award about $1 billion in equity to all employees except senior management, after the lender capped a strong year marked by a surge in profits.】

item.title: 奈飞提交修订后的全现金收购华纳兄弟要约，获得董事会支持
item.description: 奈飞以全现金方式收购华纳兄弟探索公司旗下影视制作及流媒体业务的报价获得HBO母公司董事会全票支持，且未提高827亿美元的收购价，此举旨在阻断竞争对手派拉蒙的收购企图。【原文：Netflix switched to an all-cash offer for Warner Bros Discovery's studio and streaming businesses with unanimous support from the HBO owner's board without increasing the $82.7 billion price, in an effort to close the door on rival Paramount's efforts.】
